feed.title: Public disclosure of 10 vulnerabilities affecting Bitcoin Core < 0.21.0

entry.title: Public disclosure of 10 vulnerabilities affecting Bitcoin Core < 0.21.0
entry.summary: The process of requesting CVE numbers from Mitre for historical issues is currently in progress. This retroactive approach aims to catalog and address vulnerabilities that have been previously identified but not formally documented with CVE identifiers. This step is crucial for enhancing the security posture by ensuring all known issues are accurately tracked and available for reference.
